price: But they rebelled against the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them, while they were looking on.
arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
